message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.IT, cs.SI 

Reasoning: The paper deals with classification problems and similarity measures, which are common topics in machine learning and artificial intelligence (cs.LG, cs.AI). The use of similarity measures in nearest neighbor classification and the construction of a classifier that outperforms the nearest neighbor classifier suggest that the paper may also be relevant to computer vision (cs.CV). The analysis of Bayesian similarity in a framework of multitask learning suggests that the paper may also be relevant to information theory (cs.IT) and systems and control (cs.SI).
